tumus.name: Tumus
tumus.bio: *You almost don't recognize the blaze in Tumus' eye, until you realize it's hope.*
tumus.title: Promoted Rebel

efi.name: Efi
efi.bio: *It's clear that Efi is difficult to get along with. But aren't the most challenging conquests often the most rewarding?*
efi.title: Goon

waandra.name: Waandra
waandra.bio: *Waandra has an eye for appraising and a fist for taking, and she makes sure to use both.*
waandra.title: Security Guard

nekdo.name: Nekdo
nekdo.bio: *Nekdo doesn't know what the easy life looks like, but he keeps his eyes peeled all the same.*
nekdo.title: Rebel

pazlock.name: Pazlock
pazlock.bio: *Some folks look like they can handle the rough life more than others. Pazlock? Yeah, he'll do.*
pazlock.title: Laborer

stoque.name: Stoque
stoque.bio: *Not everyone is defined by their headwear, but Stoque keeps things tightly knit.*
stoque.title: Promoted Thug

jani.name: Jani
jani.bio: *Where Jani goes, others follow. It's best to watch her closely.*
jani.title: Promoted Luminitiate

oso.name: Oso
oso.bio: *Oso has been in the griftlands for only a year, but he seems to be fitting in well.*
oso.title: Guard

bout.name: Bout
bout.bio: *Something about the curl of Bout's lip when he's displeased makes it hard to believe his piety is genuine.*
bout.title: Promoted Luminitiate

gwale.name: Gwale
gwale.bio: *Gwale wasn't born to this life, but she sure claimed it as her own anyway.*
gwale.title: Lifter

prax.name: Prax
prax.bio: *Few folks make it as far as Prax without looking smug about it. Prax is no exception.*
prax.title: Promoted Priest

monid.name: Monid
monid.bio: *Monid supposedly knows the entire Heshian tract by heart, but since she's the only one that does you'll just have to take her word for it.*
monid.title: Guard

brut.name: Brut
brut.bio: *Folks say Brut has a bubbly personality, but you think it might just be gas.*
brut.title: Bruiser

galth.name: Galth
galth.bio: *Galth's swallowed enough dirt to feel at one with the land, and he moves through it like an eel in swamp sludge.*
galth.title: Promoted Rebel

grimdellia.name: Grimdellia
grimdellia.bio: *Grimdellia was the name of a kra'deshi war queen, but you suspect this Grimdellia doesn't much care for ancient history.*
grimdellia.title: Bogger

tiq.name: Tiq
tiq.bio: *When push comes to shove, Tiq pushes and shoves. And punches. And maybe even bites.*
tiq.title: Thug

sal.name: Sal
sal.bio: *Sal's eyes suggest a bright mind, but the roughness of her hands show a hard life.*
sal.title: Bounty Hunter

kof.name: Kof
kof.bio: *This smuggler has a reputation for negotiating steep fees for his services. Perhaps the origin of the Havarian phrase "coughing up the cash".*
kof.title: Smuggler

nand.name: Nand
nand.bio: *Rumor has it Nand has been thinking about running for leadership. It's unfortunate that he doesn't live in a democracy.*
nand.title: Guard

phryniwin.name: Phryniwin
phryniwin.bio: *Phryniwin's family dedicated her to the Cult at a young age, but she's taken to it better than most.*
phryniwin.title: Priest

yibbit.name: Yibbit
yibbit.bio: *The hard times have taken their toll on Yibbit—but Yibbit doesn't seem to mind.*
yibbit.title: Laborer

lumika.name: Lumika
lumika.bio: *Lumika might not only have grown up with the silver spoon, but swallowed it whole.*
lumika.title: Luminitiate

ban.name: Ban
ban.bio: *Ban can knock some sense into you—or out. Your choice.*
ban.title: Smuggler

rorok.name: Rorok
rorok.bio: *Like many of the rank and file, Rorok finds it easier to enforce the laws she makes up on the spot.*
rorok.title: Goon

cobb.name: Cobb
cobb.bio: *Surviving Admiralty bootcamp requires either the very cunning or the very resilient. It's unclear if Cobb is either of these.*
cobb.title: Goon

hamund.name: Hamund
hamund.bio: *Hamund has never seen the bright side, if only because the bright side stays out of sight.*
hamund.title: Radical

tellomeer.name: Tellomeer
tellomeer.bio: *This kra'deshi has a reputation for holding the group together, for good or ill.*
tellomeer.title: Security Guard

karet.name: Karet
karet.bio: *A steely gaze can't distract from the twitch of Karet's fingers, like he's dissecting a piece of Vagrant tech in his head.*
karet.title: Promoted Security Guard

fanda.name: Fanda
fanda.bio: *Fanda can often be heard muttering a prayer under her breath, even while she's making life difficult for others.*
fanda.title: Goon

kheven.name: Kheven
kheven.bio: *Kheven doesn't seem to look entirely certain about his place in the world, but he's clearly hoping to make the best of it.*
kheven.title: Security Guard

treena.name: Treena
treena.bio: *Treena's fiery temper is matched only by the explosive mixtures she enjoys dabbling with.*
treena.title: Chemist

yunni.name: Yunni
yunni.bio: *When you need the fastest pencil pusher in the West, you need Yunni.*
yunni.title: Clerk

hanbi.name: Hanbi
hanbi.bio: *Hanbi's rifle has been the bitter end of more than a few hunters in the griftlands.*
hanbi.title: Assassin

ellomen.name: Ellomen
ellomen.bio: *Ellomen's head for business is famous throughout Murder Bay. But so is her lack of nerve.*
ellomen.title: Wealthy Merchant

kilka.name: Kilka
kilka.bio: *Kilka has the look of someone who was promised a better hand than the one she got. She suspects someone cheated.*
kilka.title: Pamphleteer

quale.name: Quale
quale.bio: *As a pup, Quale never thought he'd find purpose in Hesh's slippery grip.*
quale.title: Zealot

danel.name: Danel
danel.bio: *Danel is almost as good at spending money as he is at earning it--hopefully the balance never tips.*
danel.title: Promoted Wealthy Merchant

endo.name: Endo
endo.bio: *Either Endo's got a smudge on his nose, or the call of the divine has turned his gaze within.*
endo.title: Priest

enit.name: Enit
enit.bio: *Enit's success as a smuggler is nevertheless earned—in spite of her being known to skim a little off the top of whatever it is she's smuggling.*
enit.title: Smuggler

alongwy.name: Alongwy
alongwy.bio: *You have a feeling you once lost a job to this guy, but that might've been a different Alongwy. You hadn't heard he'd changed work.*
alongwy.title: Smuggler

prekt.name: Prekt
prekt.bio: *The scars on her hands suggest Prekt is no stranger to a stacked fight.*
prekt.title: Thug

kel.name: Kel
kel.bio: *Got a problem with the Spree? To Kel with it.*
kel.title: Raider

threekwa.name: Threekwa
threekwa.bio: *Threekwa. The name is a noble one in Rentorian lands, even if his actions in these parts speak otherwise.*
threekwa.title: Hunter

pau.name: Pau
pau.bio: *Hesh doesn't expect much from its followers, but Pau clearly strives to exceed expectations.*
pau.title: Zealot

rasma.name: Rasma
rasma.bio: *Word is Rasma was the youngest Spark Baron to ever join the ranks, which does explain the cherubic shine in her eyes.*
rasma.title: Security Guard

taug.name: Taug
taug.bio: *Word has it young Taug wanted to be a nurse. Seems these days he's more likely to make wounds than mend them.*
taug.title: Promoted Thug

zyn.name: Zyn
zyn.bio: *Like all well-trained assassins, Zyn leaps before you look.*
zyn.title: Assassin

cash.name: Cash
cash.bio: *Cash's nom de guerre is more aspirational than accurate.*
cash.title: Wealthy Merchant

kyrgian.name: Kyrgian
kyrgian.bio: *Kra'deshi who find themselves in Kyrgian's position are typically orphans, runaways, or both.*
kyrgian.title: Pamphleteer

grex.name: Grex
grex.bio: *It's easy to feel sorry for someone with a face like Grex's. At least, Grex thinks it should be.*
grex.title: Guard

coruga.name: Coruga
coruga.bio: *Coruga's wealth is a sign of her commitment to fleecing as many people as possible.*
coruga.title: Promoted Wealthy Merchant

weezil.name: Weezil
weezil.bio: *Anyone with Weezil's name on their lips best be careful how they speak it.*
weezil.title: Sharpshooter

yabboi.name: Yabboi
yabboi.bio: *Yabboi has a tendency of showing up in unexpected places, but it's fun to announce his arrival.*
yabboi.title: Promoted Priest

idri.name: Idri
idri.bio: *Where trouble goes, Idri follows, always on the lookout for opportunity.*
idri.title: Radical

iggory.name: Iggory
iggory.bio: *You can tell Iggory approaches by the florid waft emanating from his coat: the work of a pocket perfumer.*
iggory.title: Professional

krikith.name: Krikith
krikith.bio: *You're not sure what came first: Krikith, or the sound of his name chirping from the bog.*
krikith.title: Cultivator

tlok.name: Tlok
tlok.bio: *Most jarackles struggle to get the respect they deserve, so it says a lot that folks speak Tlok's name like he's one to watch out for.*
tlok.title: Dockhand

orug.name: Orug
orug.bio: *Whether it's heavy lifting or heavy hitting, Orug's not afraid to get heavy.*
orug.title: Heavy Laborer

juke.name: Juke
juke.bio: *Juke's a bit of a newcomer on the Havarian smuggling scene, but she makes up for it by charging a ruthless fee.*
juke.title: Dockhand

koqy.name: Koqy
koqy.bio: *The Heshians say good food brings you closer to the divine. Koqy could be a priest.*
koqy.title: Bartender

pengemunt.name: Pengemunt
pengemunt.bio: *Pengemunt carries himself with the tell-tale gait of an Aerostat officer.*
pengemunt.title: Coin Trader

phroluk.name: Phroluk
phroluk.bio: *Some people keep pets. Phroluk keeps battle steeds.*
phroluk.title: Raider

brash.name: Brash
brash.bio: *Despite her name, Brash is actually pretty level-headed.*
brash.title: Dockhand

topo.name: Topo
topo.bio: *Nobody in Havaria's ever heard of a smuggler with a heart of gold. And nobody in Havaria's ever heard of Topo. It's unlikely the two are related.*
topo.title: Smuggler

genner.name: Genner
genner.bio: *Genner has a way of commanding silence when he speaks.*
genner.title: Clobber

denikus.name: Denikus
denikus.bio: *If Denikus's charms are as infectious as they say, you must be immune.*
denikus.title: Heartbreaker

speerun.name: Speerun
speerun.bio: *Speerun's foot falls are so silent that you wouldn't know she passed, if not for the impressions of her feet in the mud.*
speerun.title: Cultivator

zambul.name: Zambul
zambul.bio: *When the winds of change come through Havaria, Zambul will be the one waiting with her sails unfurled.*
zambul.title: Rebel

jurna.name: Jurna
jurna.bio: *Some folks love their beasts, and other folks just smell like them.*
jurna.title: Oshnu Wrangler

veerin.name: Veerin
veerin.bio: *Veerin believes in the movement, but only as much as he can hold sway in it.*
veerin.title: Rebel

ashgora.name: Ashgora
ashgora.bio: *With a name like Ashgora it's clear he comes from pedigree. No doubt his parents wish he'd stop drowning in the gene pool.*
ashgora.title: Patrol Leader

ruck.name: Ruck
ruck.bio: *Ruck's bar brawls and raucous laughter alike have earned her a reputation she doesn't seem quick to dispel.*
ruck.title: Guard

ash.name: Ash
ash.bio: *It's hard work being a bandit—even harder when you're hooked on the slurry. But Ash gets the job done.*
ash.title: Raider

kuga.name: Kuga
kuga.bio: *Rather than a bad side, Kuga seems to have a bad continent. Best to stay off it.*
kuga.title: Raider

heleet.name: Heleet
heleet.bio: *It's hard to believe Heleet has a reputation for being a bit of a Casanova, but then you always were immune to such charms.*
heleet.title: Guard

del.name: Del
del.bio: *Word is, Del fights for his workers. But nobody's ever really selfless in the griftlands, right?*
del.title: Foreman

fizluck.name: Fizluck
fizluck.bio: *Fizluck prides himself on work well done, even if it's work that never needed doing.*
fizluck.title: Goon

okonomi.name: Okonomi
okonomi.bio: *One way to climb the social ladder is to hope that Hesh's will compels it. That's Okonomi's thinking.*
okonomi.title: Luminitiate

brale.name: Brale
brale.bio: *Brale gulps brine and breathes salt like he's spent one too many cycles dunking for Hesh.*
brale.title: Zealot

blane.name: Blane
blane.bio: *Apparently Blane once dreamed of being a monster hunter, so his life satisfaction is undoubtedly not high.*
blane.title: Thief

jand.name: Jand
jand.bio: *It takes a mean life to put that mean look in Jand's eye.*
jand.title: Radical

cambury.name: Cambury
cambury.bio: *Cambury has a reputation for eloquence and poise in difficult situations. It'd be fun to see if it holds up.*
cambury.title: Patrol Leader

cwoki.name: Cwoki
cwoki.bio: *You've heard that Cwoki has a collection of trading cards depicting the upper echelon of the Heshian cult—from cardinals to archbishops. Of course, that's the Deltrean side. Unlikely Havarian clergy warrant any mention.*
cwoki.title: Dockhand

nophri.name: Nophri
nophri.bio: *Nophri isn't known for his eloquence. Should give you an advantage.*
nophri.title: Radical

irkrow.name: Irkrow
irkrow.bio: *A good bartender knows how to mix a drink. The better bartenders know how to fix a fight. Irkrow does both.*
irkrow.title: Bartender

ton.name: Ton
ton.bio: *In the grand scheme of things, Ton does pretty well for himself. On the day to day, though, he usually comes up short.*
ton.title: Guard

queek.name: Queek
queek.bio: *Not all jakes do things by the book, but Queek's reputation, at least, is queeky clean.*
queek.title: Dockhand

ebbe.name: Ebbe
ebbe.bio: *You've heard Ebbe has a steel gut, a steel toe, and a steely eye. So don't punch him in any of those places.*
ebbe.title: Patrol Leader

gorgula.name: Gorgula
gorgula.bio: *If Hesh has a will, it probably works through Gorgula.*
gorgula.title: Rogue Zealot

flekfis.name: Flekfis
flekfis.bio: *Flekfis believes in the cause and Kalandra both with the fervor of a beating drum.*
flekfis.title: Lieutenant

jeetee.name: Jeetee
jeetee.bio: *Word is Jeetee's a good boss, but in Havaria that doesn't necessarily mean she's a fair one.*
jeetee.title: Foreman

henders.name: Henders
henders.bio: *Henders used to stick his head beneath the water in the hopes of getting a look at Hesh. The constant lack of oxygen might've had an effect.*
henders.title: Luminitiate

lasquo.name: Lasquo
lasquo.bio: *As with most Admiralty, Lasquo is only hard on crime that doesn't pay.*
lasquo.title: Clerk

alo.name: Alo
alo.bio: *It's clear at a glance that Alo dislikes her job. Maybe making it a little more pleasant might earn you some traction.*
alo.title: Guard

prent.name: Prent
prent.bio: *Some folks might describe Prent as tenacious, others as just vindictive. Two coins, same purse.*
prent.title: Promoted Goon

milleeree.name: Milleeree
milleeree.bio: *In true Havarian fashion, Milleeree's promoted status seems to have been prompted by something other than her lackluster work ethic.*
milleeree.title: Promoted Laborer

mainewi.name: Mainewi
mainewi.bio: *Mainewi was raised to believe hard work would be rewarded. You're impressed he hasn't had a crisis of faith.*
mainewi.title: Promoted Laborer

gnak.name: Gnak
gnak.bio: *There are few jobs that Gnak can't pull off with a little practice. Must be nominative determinism.*
gnak.title: Heavy Laborer

gree.name: Gree
gree.bio: *Creepily enough, Gree has a reputation for singing her assassin contracts to their death.*
gree.title: Dockhand

hebbel.name: Hebbel
hebbel.bio: *Rest assured: you make a mess in his bar, and there'll be Hebbel to pay.*
hebbel.title: Bartender

melba.name: Melba
melba.bio: *Don't mess with Melba, or you'll be toast.*
melba.title: Promoted Laborer

plocka.name: Plocka
plocka.bio: *Plocka keeps her purse strings tight, but she's been known to favor a friend in need.*
plocka.title: Professional

pestafur.name: Pestafur
pestafur.bio: *Though she almost drowned once as a pup, Pestafur grew up a true-blue zealot with only the smallest fear of water.*
pestafur.title: Luminitiate

jeol.name: Jeol
jeol.bio: *Jeol's blank gaze is a little unnerving, but you've cracked harder heads.*
jeol.title: Drone Master

frizz.name: Frizz
frizz.bio: *Frizz crackles with static discharge from her wares. Best to stay a few feet back.*
frizz.title: Weaponsmith

alta.name: Alta
alta.bio: *Alta's the type who thinks the sky itself is proof of her faith—'cause it hasn't fallen down, yet.*
alta.title: Priest

eedlit.name: Eedlit
eedlit.bio: *When you want to get ahold of something rare and valuable, Eedlit is the one who can extend your reach.*
eedlit.title: Lifter

dauler.name: Dauler
dauler.bio: *There are plenty of jobs for the adventurous type in Havaria, but it takes a special kind of nerve to cut purses, and Dauler has it in spades.*
dauler.title: Thief

krog.name: Krog
krog.bio: *You'd bet your last shill that Krog knows his way around his own sleeve—preferably, though, you wouldn't bet against Krog.*
krog.title: Dockhand

toeren.name: Toeren
toeren.bio: *Toeren has the face of someone hard done by and almost done.*
toeren.title: Laborer

gode.name: Gode
gode.bio: *Like most foremen, Gode prefers folks who can get the job done.*
gode.title: Foreman

pluk.name: Pluk
pluk.bio: *Between the fuel stains and the fire in her eyes, it's easy to see a bit of yourself in Pluk.*
pluk.title: Heavy Laborer

clove.name: Clove
clove.bio: *Some folks believe the Admiralty brings order to the griftlands. Clove knows that if that's true, it's a tall one.*
clove.title: Goon

ceni.name: Ceni
ceni.bio: *Ceni's squint suggests that he might be a slow reader. Best not to ask him about it, though.*
ceni.title: Goon

xiit.name: Xiit
xiit.bio: *Folks say Xiit is a miracle worker, but the miracle is that he manages to pull himself out of the gutter each day.*
xiit.title: Smuggler

aweir.name: Aweir
aweir.bio: *Folks often look to Aweir as a natural leader, even if the hierarchy doesn't necessarily agree.*
aweir.title: Guard

feporo.name: Feporo
feporo.bio: *Sometimes when you stare into the void, Feporo stares back.*
feporo.title: Guard

brill.name: Brill
brill.bio: *You wouldn't want Brill's job. But then, neither does Brill.*
brill.title: Laborer

andwanette.name: Andwanette
andwanette.bio: *Andwanette has the kind of face that's built to last.*
andwanette.title: Socialite

sentru.name: Sentru
sentru.bio: *Just because Sentru's in charge, doesn't mean the labor's any lighter.*
sentru.title: Foreman

rook.name: Rook
rook.bio: *Despite the groomed mustache and the bum leg, Rook's got a light in his eyes only a fool would underestimate.*
rook.title: Operative

mallowi.name: Mallowi
mallowi.bio: *All Luminari are a bit stuck-up, but Mallowi's got sermons on the brain and a pike up his abyss.*
mallowi.title: Luminari

zex.name: Zex
zex.bio: *It's easy to recognize the rodent-like cunning in Zex's eyes: it's a key survival trait in the griftlands.*
zex.title: Goon

teema.name: Teema
teema.bio: *Where there's a Teema, there's a way. Unfortunately the way might just be closed to you.*
teema.title: Goon

winnie.name: Winnie
winnie.bio: *There's a curl to Winnie's lip that might suggest a sense of humor buried deep down inside—or maybe just a bad smell.*
winnie.title: Patrol Leader

gheckt.name: Gheckt
gheckt.bio: *Few Admiralty have seen as much hardship as Gheckt, and that's not just because she has a name that sounds like a hairball.*
gheckt.title: Investigator

riito.name: Riito
riito.bio: *When you want to put a wall between yourself and the world, you could do worse than Riito.*
riito.title: Goon

umriit.name: Umriit
umriit.bio: *Luminari are supposed to wade in the deep water of their faith, but Umriit looks like she's got gills under her collar.*
umriit.title: Luminari

ronno.name: Ronno
ronno.bio: *Apparently Ronno lost the hearing in her right earnub after a swamp gas explosion. Fortunately she hears extra-well out of the left one.*
ronno.title: Dockhand

lux.name: Lux
lux.bio: *The only thing more menacing than Lux's reputation is her laugh.*
lux.title: Thug

ionis.name: Ionis
ionis.bio: *Few folks survive the rigorous training needed to become Luminari. Ionis wears it like a halo of sunshine.*
ionis.title: Luminari

grumph.name: Grumph
grumph.bio: *Oshnu slime has a way of getting into everything, and Grumph talks like his throat is clogged with it.*
grumph.title: Oshnu Wrangler

murk.name: Murk
murk.bio: *For a criminal, Murk is pretty weak in resolve—but he makes up for it by being quick on his feet.*
murk.title: Thief

bebus.name: Bebus
bebus.bio: *Bebus never aspired to greatness, but a sliver of it sought him out all the same.*
bebus.title: Promoted Goon

fyrdinan.name: Fyrdinan
fyrdinan.bio: *Shroke aren't usually drawn to bureaucracy but then, who is?*
fyrdinan.title: Clerk

tarq.name: Tarq
tarq.bio:
*You haven't heard much about Tarq, but you're pretty sure you saw his name carved into a table at the Grog n' Dog. Someone else's name was carved under it—and then gouged out. 

Even bandits get the blues.*
tarq.title: Captain

oolo.name: Oolo
oolo.bio: *She looks young for an Admiralty officer of her rank, suggesting either competence or nepotism.*
oolo.title: Intelligence Officer

hrikit.name: Hrikit
hrikit.bio: *Hrikit's name has the rough edges of the Rentorian dialect, but there's no hint of an accent when she barks.*
hrikit.title: Taskmaster

dillawno.name: Dillawno
dillawno.bio: *Dillawno is the Baron you commission when you want a complicated solution to a simple problem.*
dillawno.title: Taskmaster

buleet.name: Buleet
buleet.bio: *You've met Buleet's type before, and they've always ended up dead.*
buleet.title: Turncoat

zita.name: Zita
zita.bio: *For a person who has friends, Zita hasn't always been known to treat them very well.*
zita.title: Guard

allyn.name: Allyn
allyn.bio: *Allyn's prices are fair, even when the skies aren't.*
allyn.title: Wealthy Merchant

vasti.name: Vasti
vasti.bio: *Vasti seems like an egg that's about to hatch, and whatever comes out will have claws.*
vasti.title: Promoted Security Guard

dony.name: Dony
dony.bio: *Dony believes the Admiralty is doing Hesh's work. Maybe someone should tell the Cult that.*
dony.title: Goon

rugis.name: Rugis
rugis.bio: *Rugis is working for the weekend, in that he's asserting the right to something called 'the weekend'.*
rugis.title: Promoted Rebel

erga.name: Erga
erga.bio: *Like a torn banner in the wind, Erga plays fast and loose.*
erga.title: Lifter

selaynia.name: Selaynia
selaynia.bio: *You're not sure what Selaynia invented to get himself into the Spark Barons, but if you had to guess, you wouldn't say mouthwash.*
selaynia.title: Promoted Security Guard

nadan.name: Nadan
nadan.bio: *With a face like his, it's no wonder Nadan has a reputation, even if he thinks it's bigger than it is.*
nadan.title: Leader

gao.name: Gao
gao.bio: *Gao has one of those faces you love to hate. Or hate to love? It's interchangeable, really.*
gao.title: Guard

kallo.name: Kallo
kallo.bio: *Kallo grew up with a thirst for lumin wine and a tendency to chew with her mouth open.*
kallo.title: Luminitiate

seemli.name: Seemli
seemli.bio: *Though she doesn't look like much, Seemli's eye packs a punch that's best not underestimated.*
seemli.title: Firebrand

hiqu.name: Hiqu
hiqu.bio: *Hiqu's mysterious poetry has been found scribbled in privies from Murder Bay to the Bread Fields.*
hiqu.title: Raider

viss.name: Viss
viss.bio: *The life expectancy of the average laborer in Havaria isn't long. And Viss looks twice that old.*
viss.title: Laborer

dano.name: Dano
dano.bio: *Word is Dano spends her downtime knitting and her uptime hitting. Best to approach her when her hands are empty, either way.*
dano.title: Guard

rudana.name: Rudana
rudana.bio: *What Rudana has sacrificed in scruples he's made up for in passive aggression.*
rudana.title: Clerk

justice.name: Justice
justice.bio: *As her name suggests, Justice is firm, ruthless, and has very little sense of irony.*
justice.title: Captain

leesha.name: Leesha
leesha.bio: *It's unclear whether Leesha's easygoing attitude is a result of her temperament, or the fumes radiating off her wares.*
leesha.title: Chemist

voh.name: Voh
voh.bio: *Voh charges extra for service with a smile, but it doesn't seem worth the investment.*
voh.title: Smuggler

veep.name: Veep
veep.bio: *By the callouses on his hand and the heavy sigh on his lips, it's clear Veep has been worked to the bone.*
veep.title: Laborer

tee.name: Tee
tee.bio: *It doesn't take much to be a cut above the rest in the Spree—just a good knife and a long reach. Tee has both.*
tee.title: Promoted Thug

bordenkra.name: Bordenkra
bordenkra.bio: *Bordenkra holds her head like if she gets it high enough, it'll be immune to the Havarian smells.*
bordenkra.title: Diplomat

chake.name: Chake
chake.bio: *The laborer rubs his elbows like it's been ten years since they ran out of grease.*
chake.title: Heavy Laborer

bludd.name: Bludd
bludd.bio: *Bludd's hands look clean, but something about them still makes you uncomfortable.*
bludd.title: Clobber

keebee.name: Keebee
keebee.bio: *Where most Spark Barons seek profit, Keebee seeks opportunities.*
keebee.title: Taskmaster

fallopallo.name: Fallopallo
fallopallo.bio: *Fallopallo's brood is likely disappointed in his choice of career, considering Fallopallo was the name of a famous Heshian priest.*
fallopallo.title: Taskmaster

frash.name: Frash
frash.bio: *Frash is a trickster in kra'deshi myth, known for bringing fire from the stars to lesser lifeforms. Jury's out on whether this Frash is equally patronizing.*
frash.title: Taskmaster

rug.name: Rug
rug.bio: *Where Rug walks, flavor follows, which is a sad consequence of a seasoning pouch full of bullet holes.*
rug.title: Bartender

ekel.name: Ekel
ekel.bio: *Ekel's made a reputation of keeping her chin up and taking the blows that come her way. Not sure that's a reputation anyone should want, really.*
ekel.title: Laborer

veerox.name: Veerox
veerox.bio: *It's tough making a living in the griftlands, but the myth of upward mobility keeps Veerox on the line.*
veerox.title: Poor Merchant

kashio.name: Kashio
kashio.bio: *The biggest debt-broker in Murder Bay, Kashio was once an indentured laborer who earned herself a reputation as a self-made kingpin.*
kashio.title: Freelancer

arint.name: Arint
arint.bio: *Arint was apparently head-hunted from a Luminari training facility, so she's no doubt as fervent as she is mercenary.*
arint.title: Lieutenant

mullifee.name: Mullifee
mullifee.bio: *Mullifee's stern face has been hardened by age. Once, those who cared to know her stories were lulled to sleep with whispered ghost stories and lore.*
mullifee.title: Guard Captain

onnawor.name: Onnawor
onnawor.bio: *You get the feeling Onnawor would do anything to turn a profit.*
onnawor.title: Wealthy Merchant

felena.name: Felena
felena.bio: *Not much is known about Felena, but her eyes dance unsettlingly when she looks into yours.*
felena.title: Clobber

goni.name: Goni
goni.bio: *If you had to get robbed, it wouldn't be too bad to get robbed by a face like Goni's.*
goni.title: Thug

steven.name: Steven
steven.bio: *Steven has a bit more personality than the average automech, which likely means it's extremely defective—or that the rest of the automechs are.*
steven.title: Party Machine

myrkot.name: Myrkot
myrkot.bio: *You've seen Myrkot's name written on crates, but have never chanced to look inside any of them.*
myrkot.title: Professional

durno.name: Durno
durno.bio: *Good bandits are hard to come by. Fortunately, there's Durno.*
durno.title: Raider

cadwa.name: Cadwa
cadwa.bio: *The name 'Cadwa' comes from an old folk story about outsmarting a cruel foreman, but as a bureaucrat* ***this*** *Cadwa definitely has the upper hand.*
cadwa.title: Clerk

wreet.name: Wreet
wreet.bio: *Wreet's mouth is set in a line so thin it makes his face look like cracked porcelain.*
wreet.title: Cultivator

cleme.name: Cleme
cleme.bio: *There's a* ***spark*** *of justice in Cleme's eye that makes you wonder what another life might have turned her into.*
cleme.title: Pamphleteer

malo.name: Malo
malo.bio: *Word is, Malo used to be a foreman himself, before fortune and health conspired against him.*
malo.title: Rebel

leeqi.name: Leeqi
leeqi.bio: *Word is Leeqi makes money on the side stooging for debt-brokers and keeping the derricks well-stocked with labor.*
leeqi.title: Smuggler

wrux.name: Wrux
wrux.bio: *Wrux has never met a paying customer he didn't have patience for.*
wrux.title: Bartender

kalandra.name: Kalandra
kalandra.bio: *A life of labor in the Bog has made Kalandra as cunning as she is adept.*
kalandra.title: Organizer

ferg.name: Ferg
ferg.bio: *Ferg has a reputation for doing business fast and cutthroat. Better to hold the knife rather than be under it.*
ferg.title: Captain

lopli.name: Lopli
lopli.bio: *Lopli rose to notoriety with her invention of a self-swindler, a wallet so secure even Lopli can't open it.*
lopli.title: Professional

imiko.name: Imiko
imiko.bio: *Laborers say Imiko is tough but fair—or was that tough but beware?*
imiko.title: Taskmaster

qita.name: Qita
qita.bio: *You've heard Qita's name spoken like it's got a razor's edge, but you don't remember the details.*
qita.title: Smuggler

stollo.name: Stollo
stollo.bio: *Stollo has a name that slips off the tongue like a spit. You doubt he'll turn the other cheek in response.*
stollo.title: Luminari

uraneer.name: Uraneer
uraneer.bio: *Uraneer's fingers are so sticky it's a wonder she doesn't cling to the walls.*
uraneer.title: Thief

peri.name: Peri
peri.bio: *Peri is rumored to be engaged in criminal activity on the side. Regardless of if it's true, you'd hate to be the one who started the rumor.*
peri.title: Goon

wikka.name: Wikka
wikka.bio: *Not unusual for someone like Wikka, hard-headed and steel-toed, to do well in the jakes.*
wikka.title: Promoted Dockhand

fellemo.name: Fellemo
fellemo.bio: *Fellemo's old grit has been softened somewhat by his new trappings.*
fellemo.title: Regional Manager

feldspar.name: Feldspar
feldspar.bio: *Feldspar has a reputation for fixing difficult problems, when he's not making problems* ***more*** *difficult, first.*
feldspar.title: Patrol Leader

fssh.name: Fssh
fssh.bio: *Time hasn't been kind to Fssh, but then, it hasn't been kind to you, either.*
fssh.title: Bartender

bennawem.name: Bennawem
bennawem.bio: *Bennawem speaks with a Deltrean accent, implying he was born on the mainland.*
bennawem.title: Wealthy Merchant

gura.name: Gura
gura.bio: *If the strain in his brow is anything to go by, Gura might be open to a new line of work.*
gura.title: Heavy Laborer

yacka.name: Yacka
yacka.bio: *When opportunity knocks, Yacka yodels in response.*
yacka.title: Promoted Dockhand

pozgo.name: Pozgo
pozgo.bio: *"Pozgo" was the legendary ruler of a long-forgotten planet. You wonder if* ***this*** *Pozgo lived up to his parents' expectations.*
pozgo.title: Dockhand

asnitho.name: Asnitho
asnitho.bio: *Asnitho likes to spend her time off walking in nature. And she's got the yote scars to prove it.*
asnitho.title: Patrol Leader

quarryn.name: Quarryn
quarryn.bio: *Rumor has it Quarryn earned his way into the Spark Barons by inventing an automatic nose-blower. Guess he can sniff out any opportunity.*
quarryn.title: Security Guard

spotz.name: Spotz
spotz.bio: *If you think Spotz is a little slow on the uptake, you should see Spotz run.*
spotz.title: Clerk

bax.name: Bax
bax.bio: *Bax is dangerously predictable: he'll sell you out for a hit of slurry, then break your heart when he feels bad about it.*
bax.title: Thug

llullably.name: Llullably
llullably.bio: *Llullably is rumored to have a voice as sweet as clover, but the Heshian chants reduce it to a watery gurgle.*
llullably.title: Priest

sru.name: Sru
sru.bio: *Sru isn't your typical kra'deshi name—you wonder if it's short for something.*
sru.title: Taskmaster

pock.name: Pock
pock.bio: *Pock chews a piece of leather between her front teeth like it's a pacifier.*
pock.title: Cultivator

grunjax.name: Grunjax
grunjax.bio: *Grunjax has breath so rancid you can smell it after he's left the room. But he sure does have a nice smile.*
grunjax.title: Dockhand

phinoon.name: Phinoon
phinoon.bio: *Phinoon is often seen killing it on the dance floor, but it's unclear if this means he's a good dancer or a terrible hunter.*
phinoon.title: Patrol Leader

vectorini.name: Vectorini
vectorini.bio: *Vectorini once had a soft spot for the laborers, until he lost an entire salvage to sticky fingers.*
vectorini.title: Taskmaster

ptchu.name: Ptchu
ptchu.bio: *When Ptchu introduces himself, people tend to back away. But the name isn't as contagious as it sounds.*
ptchu.title: Oshnu Wrangler

kenga.name: Kenga
kenga.bio: *Kenga's never received a shill she hasn't scrutinized for authenticity.*
kenga.title: Promoted Wealthy Merchant

gen.name: Gen
gen.bio: *Folks say Gen has been seen talking to revolutionary types, but how would anyone know? It's not like they wear a uniform.*
gen.title: Patrol Leader

gumthow.name: Gumthow
gumthow.bio: *If Gumthow had a shill for every time she's been stiffed on a deal, she'd be able to retire.*
gumthow.title: Poor Merchant

lili.name: Lili
lili.bio: *Word is, Lili would sell his own grandmother if he thought he could buy her back at half price next week.*
lili.title: Wealthy Merchant

nodoloolis.name: Nodoloolis
nodoloolis.bio: *Nodoloolis is named after an ancient city of the Vagrant Age, now rumored to sit at the bottom of the Deltrean Sea.*
nodoloolis.title: Professional

opple.name: Opple
opple.bio: *Best watch the manifest close, as Opple has a habit of doing black magic with the numbers.*
opple.title: Lifter

sandrano.name: Sandrano
sandrano.bio: *Sandrano chose his career based off the assumption that desk jockeys get the best desk tchochkes.*
sandrano.title: Clerk

minfen.name: Minfen
minfen.bio: *You've heard Minfen used to be an indebted worker. Most aren't lucky enough to make it out.*
minfen.title: Dockhand

brenna.name: Brenna
brenna.bio: *The life of a laborer is hard, but it seems the life of a rebel is even harder.*
brenna.title: Rebel

heft.name: Heft
heft.bio: *Heft might be intimidating if she didn't have a habit of chewing her nails to the quick.*
heft.title: Thief

erbla.name: Erbla
erbla.bio: *You might call Erbla radiant, but that's probably just the radiation.*
erbla.title: Heavy Laborer

wade.name: Wade
wade.bio: *There are few Rise as ambitious as Wade, but the movement wouldn't exist without folks like her.*
wade.title: Rebel

worrik.name: Worrik
worrik.bio: *You have to be fast to get seniority in the jakes, and Worrik's made a habit out of kicking off with his good foot.*
worrik.title: Promoted Dockhand

shel.name: Shel
shel.bio: *Shel has a glint in her eye so sharp you could shuck an oyster off it.*
shel.title: Downtrodden Merchant

astal.name: Astal
astal.bio: *You're sure you've heard Astal's name spat by Heshians, which means he's undoubtedly quite the heretic.*
astal.title: Professional

hundruthor.name: Hundruthor
hundruthor.bio: *Hundruthor knows the value of his time, and he's not sure you're worth it.*
hundruthor.title: Auctioneer

drabit.name: Drabit
drabit.bio: *Drabit was born in this life, but he's got no plans to die in it, too.*
drabit.title: Pamphleteer

nup.name: Nup
nup.bio: *Bandits don't generally take to leadership, unless it's as tough and ruthless as Nup.*
nup.title: Captain

dellena.name: Dellena
dellena.bio: *Having your own parish is the closest a common Deltrean can get to nobility. The rules are different in Havaria, but maybe nobody told Dellena that.*
dellena.title: Priest

bina.name: Bina
bina.bio: *Bina comes from a long line of warriors, known for getting the job done.*
bina.title: Smuggler
